title: Tasty Chicken Majestic ( Masala Coated ) Recipe
content:
Delicious chicken majestic which is Hyderabadi famous street food. This tastes amazing on its own or as a side dish for rice.

 

Chicken Majestic Recipe

Prep time: 10 mins

Cook time: 30 mins

Total time: 40 mins

 

Recipe type: Appetizer

Cuisine: Indian

Serves: 4 servings

 

Ingredients

Boneless Chicken - 500 grams

Curd or Plain Yogurt - 3 tablespoon

Ginger Garlic Paste - 1 tablespoon

Salt to taste

Egg - 1

All-Purpose Flour / Maida - 3 tablespoon

Cornflour - 3 tablespoon

Chilli Powder - 1 tablespoon

Pepper Powder - 1 teaspoon

Cumin Powder - 1 teaspoon

Garam masala powder - 1 teaspoon

Turmeric powder - ½ teaspoon

Oil for pan-frying

 

FOR MASALA:

Oil - 1 tablespoon

Curry leaves a handful

Garlic Paste - 1 teaspoon

Green Chillies - 2 chopped

Chilli Powder - 1 teaspoon

Garam Masala powder - 1 teaspoon

Turmeric powder - ½ teaspoon

Curd / Plain Yogurt - 2 tablespoon

Salt to taste

Soy Sauce - to taste

Black Pepper powder - 1 teaspoon

 

Instructions

Mix chicken with salt and yogurt and leave to marinate for 30 mins to overnight.

Add all the ingredients. Marinate chicken with all things listed for marination.

Heat oil for pan-frying. Drop chicken and fry till golden.

Drain and set aside.

Heat oil in a pan. Add garlic, curry leaves, and chilies and saute.

Add spice powders and curd. Mix well.,

Add fried chicken and mix well. Add pepper powder and soy sauce.

Serve it hot.

recommendations.content:

recommendations.content:

recommendations.title: Tasty Black Pepper Chicken Fry Recipe
recommendations.content:
Delicious juicy and crispy black pepper chicken fry which tastes amazing. You can serve it as a side or as an appetizer for any parties.
 
Black pepper chicken fry recipe
 
Prep time: 10 mins
Cook time: 10 mins
Total time: 20 mins

recommendations.title: Tasty Chicken Lasagna Recipe
recommendations.content:
Lasagna is quite easy to make but it can feed a crowd. All you need is to make some tomato sauce and white sauce and you are good to go. You can make a huge batch of it and make multiple pans of lasagna and freeze it. You can directly bake frozen lasagna and enjoy on busy weeknights.
